test_message: Process case CLM-2024-78432 for J. Smith vs ABC Insurance, estimated recovery £4,200

case_summary.overall_assessment: Severe discrepancies between aggregation and validation; case flagged for urgent legal review due to critical validation failures and fraud risk.

claim_summary.incident_description: Rear-end collision; insured vehicle was stopped at traffic light and struck from behind by third-party driver insured by ABC Insurance.

liability_summary.determination: Clear liability based on police report and damage consistency; third party failed to stop in time.

validation_status.data_accuracy_status: INVALID - Aggregation results flagged as unavailable at validation check; critical cross-verification failed.
validation_status.liability_clarity_status: UNCLEAR - Validation agent could not confirm liability due to alleged missing evidence.
validation_status.documentation_status: CRITICAL_MISSING - Validation flagged missing aggregation, liability, and core evidence docs.
validation_status.compliance_status: NEEDS_REVIEW - Regulatory and internal compliance unattainable due to evidence shortfalls.

discrepancies_identified.description: Validation & Compliance Agent reported critical aggregation results as missing, despite Aggregation Agent returning complete data.
Liability assessment considered unclear by validation, though aggregation provided supporting documents and 100% fault.
Documentation completeness flagged as critical missing by validation, not supported by aggregation inventory.

exception_flags.description: Agent cross-communication discrepancy regarding aggregation data presence—potential system sync issue.
exception_flags.recommended_action: Immediate manual audit of agent data handoff and aggregation results. Re-run validation after confirming data is synchronized.

exception_flags.description: Validation did not recognize available evidence supporting liability assessment.
exception_flags.recommended_action: Legal and compliance teams to verify all critical supporting documents are indexed and available for validation agent; update workflow if process gap found.

exception_flags.description: Medium fraud score and investigation required due to system inconsistencies and incomplete validation.
exception_flags.recommended_action: Hold recovery process; conduct system integrity review and escalate to internal fraud risk review board.

next_steps.action: Conduct full audit of data aggregation and validation handoff. Confirm that all relevant data and evidence are recognized by validation agent.
Flag case for urgent legal review due to unresolved discrepancies and elevated fraud risk.
Once audit is resolved, rerun validation and compliance checks on synchronized dataset.
